objects.text:
BUY ONE CAMERA,
GET ONE FREE

• 16.3MP X-Trans Sensor
• High-Precision EVF
• Fast Autofocus System
• Built-in Wi-Fi

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body with premium build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Fast autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability at 60fps
• Advanced manual controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure compensation, and drive modes
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes that recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Durable metal top and bottom plates for long-lasting performance

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold, adventurous theme tailored to market a camera deal. The background uses a dual-panel layout: a dark left section and a slightly lighter right, overlaid with a subtle golden grid and geometric accents. Two main text layers (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) at the top-left emphasize the campaign's call to excitement in large, bold yellow type. Below, the `tagline` layer offers the promotional message in a modern white font, while the `description` layer lists product features in light gray. The `price` is prominently highlighted in large yellow text, and a strong call-to-action button (`cta_background` + `cta`) invites engagement. A high-resolution camera image (`product_image`) dominates the right side. 

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Gray: #1A2026
- Dark Slate: #232931
- Golden Yellow: #FFC300
- Soft White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray: #E0E0E0
product_color: The product image showcases the Fujifilm X-T10 camera in a professional and sleek black finish, making black (#1C1C1C) the dominant color, contributing to a refined and premium feel. Silver and metallic gray (#B0B0B0) accents highlight functional dials and buttons, adding contrast and detail. Subtle white text elements (#FFFFFF) on the body enhance readability and brand visibility, while a small splash of red (#C0392B) and orange (#F39C12) on lens markings draws attention without disrupting the monochrome scheme. These colors blend seamlessly, balancing utility and aesthetics. Use a color palette of black, silver, white, red, and orange for a bold yet elegant advertisement banner.
